d.company

Interface CompanyDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompanyDBDAO

    public interface CompanyDAO
    All the methods relevant to company bean. These methods will be overwritten to allow interface with the relevant Database/file. In this case we are interfacing with Derby DB.
